definition: to sit on the fence/to take both sides in a dispute
to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses

sentences.english: The liberals prefer to sit on the fence while the other parties fight it out.
sentences.chinese: 自由黨寧可抱騎牆態度，坐待其他黨派去鬥爭到底。
別在所有問題上都持騎牆態度呀。

sentences.english: The " in-between" will fade from your view.
sentences.chinese: 騎牆中庸的狀態將從你的視野中退出。

sentences.english: Sooner or later you'll have to come down on one side or the other; you can't just sit on the fence.
sentences.chinese: 你遲早會倒向這邊或那邊，不能只是採取騎牆態度。
